languages.text: "Я был должен вмешаться, поскольку Глейто перехватил подозрительный сигнал. Зашифрованное послание содержало слова "ереси" и "розыск". Сигнал удалось проследить до рабочей станции Мастера вокса. Пришлось отправить Глейто на разведку — для получения новых улик и, в конечном счете, ради вашей безопасности".

traits.locale_text: "Глейто перехватил подозрительный сигнал. Зашифрованное послание содержало слова "преступник", "Каликсис", и "они знают". Сигнал удалось проследить до каюты вокс-мастера. Я был вынужден отправить Глейто на разведку — ради вашей безопасности".

languages.text: "I was compelled to intervene as Glaito had intercepted a suspicious signal. The encrypted message contained the words 'heresy' and 'fugitive.' I managed to trace the signal back to the Vox Master's work station. I needed to dispatch Glaito on a reconnaissance mission — to obtain new evidence and, ultimately, to ensure your safety."
languages.original_text: "Я был должен вмешаться, поскольку Глейто перехватил подозрительный сигнал. Зашифрованное послание содержало слова "ереси" и "розыск". Сигнал удалось проследить до рабочей станции Мастера вокса. Пришлось отправить Глейто на разведку — для получения новых улик и, в конечном счете, ради вашей безопасности".

I managed to trace the signal back to the Vox Master's work station. I needed to dispatch Glaito on a reconnaissance mission — to obtain new evidence and, ultimately, to ensure your safety."

I managed to trace the signal back to the Vox Master's work station. I needed to dispatch Glaito on a reconnaissance mission — to obtain new evidence and, ultimately, to ensure your safety."

I managed to trace the signal back to the Vox Master's work station. I needed to dispatch Glaito on a reconnaissance mission — to obtain new evidence and, ultimately, to ensure your safety."

I managed to trace the signal back to the Vox Master's work station. I needed to dispatch Glaito on a reconnaissance mission — to obtain new evidence and, ultimately, to ensure your safety."

I managed to trace the signal back to the Vox Master's work station. I needed to dispatch Glaito on a reconnaissance mission — to obtain new evidence and, ultimately, to ensure your safety."

languages.text: 「グライトが不審な信号を傍受したため、私はやむを得ず介入しました。その暗号化されたメッセージには『異端』と『逃亡者』という言葉が含まれていました。私はその信号の発信源をヴォクス・マスターの作業端末まで突き止めることに成功しました。そこで私はグライトを偵察任務に送り出す必要がありました。新たな証拠を得て、最終的にはあなたの安全を確保するためです」
languages.original_text: "I was compelled to intervene as Glaito had intercepted a suspicious signal. The encrypted message contained the words 'heresy' and 'fugitive.' I managed to trace the signal back to the Vox Master's work station. I needed to dispatch Glaito on a reconnaissance mission — to obtain new evidence and, ultimately, to ensure your safety."

traits.locale_text: 「グライトが不審な信号を傍受したため、私はやむを得ず介入しました。その暗号化されたメッセージには『異端』と『逃亡者』という言葉が含まれていました。私はその信号の発信源をヴォクス・マスターの作業端末まで突き止めることに成功しました。そこで私はグライトを偵察任務に送り出す必要がありました。新たな証拠を得て、最終的にはあなたの安全を確保するためです」

languages.text: "Glaito şüpheli bir sinyal yakaladığından müdahale etmek zorunda kaldım. Bu şifreli mesajda "kâfirlik" ve "kaçak" kelimeleri geçiyordu. Söz konusu sinyalin izini sürdüğümde ise beni Voks Üstadı'nın yanına geldim. Yeni kanıtlar bulmak ve nihayetinde güvenliğinizi sağlamak için de Glaito'yu keşif görevine göndermem gerekti."
languages.original_text: "I was compelled to intervene as Glaito had intercepted a suspicious signal. The encrypted message contained the words 'heresy' and 'fugitive.' I managed to trace the signal back to the Vox Master's work station. I needed to dispatch Glaito on a reconnaissance mission — to obtain new evidence and, ultimately, to ensure your safety."

traits.locale_text: "Glaito şüpheli bir sinyal yakaladığından müdahale etmek zorunda kaldım. Bu şifreli mesajda "kâfirlik" ve "kaçak" kelimeleri geçiyordu. Söz konusu sinyalin izini sürdüğümde ise beni Voks Üstadı'nın çalışma yerine ulaştırdı. Yeni kanıtlar elde etmek ve nihayetinde güvenliğinizi saklamak için de Glaito'yu bir keşif görevine göndermem gerekiyordu."

languages.text: «Me vi obligado a intervenir porque Glaito había interceptado una señal sospechosa. El mensaje encriptado contenía las palabras "herejía" y "fugitivo". Logré rastrear la señal al puesto de trabajo de la maestra de vocos. Debía enviar a Glaito a una misión de reconocimiento, para encontrar pruebas y, así, garantizar su seguridad».
languages.original_text: "I was compelled to intervene as Glaito had intercepted a suspicious signal. The encrypted message contained the words 'heresy' and 'fugitive.' I managed to trace the signal back to the Vox Master's work station. I needed to dispatch Glaito on a reconnaissance mission — to obtain new evidence and, ultimately, to ensure your safety."

traits.locale_text: «Me vi obligado a intervenir porque Glaito había interceptado una señal sospechosa. El mensaje encriptado contenía las palabras "herejía" y "fugitivo". Logré rastrear la señal al puesto de trabajo de la maestra de vocos. Debía enviar a Glaito a una misión de reconocimiento, para encontrar pruebas y, así, garantizar su seguridad».

languages.text: “我不得不介入船员的正常工作，因为格雷托截获了一段可疑信号，这段加密信息中包含‘异端’与‘逃犯’这两个词。我一路追查信号源，最终查到了音阵大师的工作站。于是，我派遣格雷托执行侦察任务，收集新的证据，从而确保你的安全。”
languages.original_text: "I was compelled to intervene as Glaito had intercepted a suspicious signal. The encrypted message contained the words 'heresy' and 'fugitive.' I managed to trace the signal back to the Vox Master's work station. I needed to dispatch Glaito on a reconnaissance mission — to obtain new evidence and, ultimately, to ensure your safety."

traits.locale_text: “我不得不介入船员的正常工作，因为格雷托截获了一段可疑信号，这段加密信息中包含‘异端’与‘逃犯’这两个词。我一路追查信号源，最终查到了音阵大师的工作站。于是，我派遣格雷托执行侦察任务，收集新的证据，从而确保你的安全。”

languages.text: « Glaito a intercepté un signal suspect. J'ai donc été contraint d'intervenir. Le message crypté contenait les mots "hérésie" et "fugitif". J'ai réussi à suivre le signal jusqu'au poste de travail de la maîtresse-vox. Je devais envoyer Glaito en mission de reconnaissance, afin de recueillir de nouvelles preuves et assurer votre sécurité. »
languages.original_text: "I was compelled to intervene as Glaito had intercepted a suspicious signal. The encrypted message contained the words 'heresy' and 'fugitive.' I managed to trace the signal back to the Vox Master's work station. I needed to dispatch Glaito on a reconnaissance mission — to obtain new evidence and, ultimately, to ensure your safety."

traits.locale_text: « Glaito a intercepté un signal suspect. J'ai donc été contraint d'intervenir. Le message crypté contenait les mots "hérésie" et "fugitif". J'ai réussi à suivre le signal jusqu'au poste de travail de la maîtresse-vox. Je devais envoyer Glaito en mission de reconnaissance, afin de recueillir de nouvelles preuves et assurer votre sécurité. »

languages.text: "Ich war gezwungen, einzuschreiten, nachdem Glaito ein verdächtiges Signal geortet hatte. Die verschlüsselte Nachricht enthielt die Begriffe 'Ketzerei' und 'flüchtig'. Ich konnte das Signal zum Arbeitsplatz der Voxmeisterin zurückverfolgen. Ich musste Glaito auf eine Aufklärungsmission schicken ... um neue Beweise zu sammeln und damit Eure Sicherheit zu gewährleisten."
languages.original_text: "I was compelled to intervene as Glaito had intercepted a suspicious signal. The encrypted message contained the words 'heresy' and 'fugitive.' I managed to trace the signal back to the Vox Master's work station. I needed to dispatch Glaito on a reconnaissance mission — to obtain new evidence and, ultimately, to ensure your safety."

traits.locale_text: "Ich war gezwungen, einzuschreiten, nachdem Glaito ein verdächtiges Signal geortet hatte. Die verschlüsselte Nachricht enthielt die Begriffe 'Ketzerei' und 'flüchtig'. Ich konnte das Signal zum Arbeitsplatz der Voxmeisterin zurückverfolgen.
